issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports strengthening the Affordable Care Act, expanding access to affordable healthcare, and lowering prescription drug prices

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Advocates for small business support, job creation, and workforce training programs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants

issues.title: Education Investment
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, student debt relief, and workforce development programs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for clean energy initiatives, reducing carbon emissions, and supporting green technology

issues.title: Technology and Innovation
issues.description: Supports funding for STEM education, technology research, and promoting innovation in emerging industries

issues.title: Social Justice
issues.description: Supports racial equity, criminal justice reform, and anti-discrimination policies

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Supports diplomatic approaches to international relations, strong alliances, and human rights
